name: Ricochet Romance
description:
Fend off angry people with kind and romantic words! Someone's trying to kill you? Tell them you love them! Gain Romance to unlock some new abilities!

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare #32

~Controls~

Just the mouse!

Unless you get far enough to unlock the arrow keys...ヽ(⌐■_■)ノ

(also f11 toggles fullscreen mode!)

NOTE: I worked a little further on the game after the jam, fixing some of the bigger issues and making some minor visual changes. The jam submission AND the post-jam version are both available for download.
